body_html: @teng-li, this is true, the functionality added by this PR can be achieved by creating multiple groups for the same ranks, each group operating on it's own subset of GPUs. This adds complexity to the user code, though, that is hidden by this PR at the expense of having a potentially untrackable number of communicators.
